thread.title: Games[CC] seeks Doom3 programmer to update mod

post.author: Reid
post.body:
Hi,

I'm looking for a programmer to update the Doom3[CC] mod to the latest version of Doom3 v1.3.1.

A lot of people are buying the game from Steam, which only sells the 1.3.1 version of Doom3. Unfortunately, the Doom3[CC] mod only works with v1.3.

If you are a programmer and would like to make Doom3[CC] compatible with v1.3.1 of Doom3, then many people will be thankful for your efforts!

About Doom3[CC]:
This modification of Doom3 includes closed captioning for dialog, sound effects and music in five different languages, English, French, German, Portuguese and Spanish. It also includes a visual sound radar to show approximately where sounds are coming from.

About Games[CC]:
An all volunteer group of people who research and develop methods to provide closed captioning of videogames for the hard of hearing and deaf.

The source can be downloaded from:
http://gamescc.rbkdesign.com/
